mapper.select: select notice_index as noticeIndex, notice_type as noticeType, notice_title as noticeTitle, notice_reg_date as noticeRegDate, notice_state as noticeState from (select rownum as rnum, n.* from (select * from notice_tbl where notice_state='정상' and notice_type='사용자' order by rownum desc) n) where rnum between #{start} and #{end}
select count(*) cnt from notice_tbl where notice_type='사용자'

select notice_index as noticeIndex, notice_type as noticeType, notice_title as noticeTitle, notice_filename as noticeFilename, notice_filepath as noticeFilepath, notice_reg_date as noticeRegDate, notice_content as noticeContent from notice_tbl where notice_index=#{noticeIndex}

select faq_index as faqIndex, faq_user_type as faqUserType, faq_question as faqQuestion, faq_answer as faqAnswer, faq_state as faqState, faq_reg_date as faqRegDate from (select rownum as rnum, f.* from (select * from faq_tbl where faq_state='정상' order by rownum desc) f) where rnum between #{start} and #{end}
